attributes.action: stop the proposed plans to build an Incinerator  (Waste Treatment Plant) at New Cheshire Business Park in Wincham Lane, Wincham, Cheshire.  As proposed by Resource Recovery Solutions (Cheshire) Ltd (RRS), a partnership between United Utilities and Interserve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Objections:-    
The site is not needed as Cheshire has more Waste disposal capacity than it already needs.
    
The site is completely inappropriate as it is in the middle of a village.    
The site is completely inappropriate as it is on the edge of 'green' belt land.    
The site is completely inappropriate as using a highly hazardous designated ' RED' route to access and leave the site.  
          
The site is completely inappropriate as it will cause grave noise, light and enviromental pollution that will impact upon a rural village community.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
